```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = '../../')
library(tidyverse)
library(devtools)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(cytofkit)
library(GSVA)
library(taproom)
source("../../scripts/functions.R")
```



```{r}
cell_subset <- read_csv(params$cellSubset)

sce <- readRDS(params$cells)[,cell_subset$cell_id]

percent_luminal <- params$percent_luminal
```

Clustering
```{r}
markers <- read_markers(params$markers_list)

if(params$markers == "all_markers"){
  imc.data <- t(logcounts(sce))
}else if(params$markers == "specified_markers"){  
  imc.data <- t(logcounts(sce[unique(unlist(markers$cell_types)),]))
}


imc.flowSOM.cluster <- cytof_cluster(xdata = imc.data, method = "FlowSOM",
                                     FlowSOM_k = as.integer(params$cluster_options))

FlowSOM <- as.data.frame(imc.flowSOM.cluster) %>% 
  rownames_to_column("id")

colnames(FlowSOM)[2] <- "cluster"
FlowSOM$cluster <- as.character(FlowSOM$cluster)
```

Gene set enrichment analysis
```{r}
gsva_markers <- list(cell_types = markers[["cell_types"]][c("Stromal", "T cells", "Epithelial (luminal)", "Macrophage")], cell_states = "")

expression_tibble <- t(logcounts(sce)) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  rownames_to_column("id") %>% 
  left_join(FlowSOM) %>% 
  select(-id) %>% 
  as_tibble()

assignments <- assign_clusters(expression_tibble, gsva_markers)

GSVA_assignment <- assignments$assignment
manual_assignment <- manual_cluster_assignment(assignments$expression, markers)


cell_assignments <- left_join(FlowSOM, select(GSVA_assignment, cluster, GSVA_cell_type)) %>% 
  left_join(manual_assignment)
```

```{r}
FlowSOM$method <- "FlowSOM"
FlowSOM$params <- paste(params$markers, paste0("k", params$cluster_options), sep = "_")
FlowSOM$percent_epithelial <- percent_luminal

write_csv(FlowSOM, file = paste0(params$output_results, 
                                 "Epithelial_overclustering_FlowSOM_clusters-",
                                 params$markers, "-k", params$cluster_options, 
                                 "-", percent_luminal, ".csv"))
```
